function.name: application_search
function.description: This function is used to search something on an application on TV device.

location.description: The location where the device which needs to be used to launch the application is located.

room.description: The room where the air conditioner is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device to be used to launch an application.

app_name.description: The application which the user intends to launch on the device.

search_term.description: The search query for the application.
